price: তেওঁলোকে উত্তৰাধিকাৰী হ’ব ফিৰদাউছৰ, য’ত তেওঁলোক স্থায়ী হ’ব।
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ يَرِثُونَ ٱلۡفِرۡدَوۡسَ هُمۡ فِيهَا خَٰلِدُونَ

version.title: Assamese translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Assamese by Sh. Rafiqul-Islam Habib Ar-Rahman in 1438 H.

meta.transliteration: alladhīna yarithūna al-fir'dawsa hum fīhā khālidūna
